param.name: maxHitsIndex
param.label: maxHits
param.help: K-mers that appear > maxHits times in the genome will be randomly sampled down to max-hits locations. To take advantage of k-mer sampling, use the same value of maxHits during index creation and alignment.

param.name: wordLenIndex
param.label: wordLen
param.help: the size of k-mers used for seed hits

param.name: skipDistanceIndex
param.label: Skip-distance
param.help: the distance to skip ahead in the genome before forming the next k-mer to index. Skip-distance must be between 1 and wordLen (inclusive)
